languages.text: "К оружию! Целимся в стены или пол — внешнюю дверь быстро не снести!"
"To arms! Aim for the walls or the floor — we won't get through the outer door quickly enough!"
languages.original_text: "К оружию! Целимся в стены или пол — внешнюю дверь быстро не снести!"

traits.locale_text: "To arms! Aim for the walls or the floor — we won't get through the outer door quickly enough!"
"To arms! Aim for the walls or the floor — we won't get through the outer door quickly enough!"
"To arms! Aim for the walls or the floor — we won't get through the outer door quickly enough!"
"To arms! Aim for the walls or the floor — we won't get through the outer door quickly enough!"
"To arms! Aim for the walls or the floor — we won't get through the outer door quickly enough!"

languages.text: “拿起武器！瞄准墙壁或者地板，外门一时半会儿恐怕打不穿！”
languages.original_text: "To arms! Aim for the walls or the floor — we won't get through the outer door quickly enough!"

traits.locale_text: “拿起武器！瞄准墙壁或者地板，外门一时半会儿恐怕打不穿！”

languages.text: «¡A las armas! ¡Apuntad a los muros o al suelo; no vamos a llegar a la puerta!».
languages.original_text: "To arms! Aim for the walls or the floor — we won't get through the outer door quickly enough!"

traits.locale_text: «¡A las armas! ¡Apuntad a los muros o al suelo; no vamos a llegar a la puerta!».

languages.text: 「武器を取れ！壁か床を狙え。外のドアじゃ間に合わない！」
languages.original_text: "To arms! Aim for the walls or the floor — we won't get through the outer door quickly enough!"

traits.locale_text: 「武器を取れ！壁か床を狙え。外のドアじゃ間に合わない！」

languages.text: "Zu den Waffen! Zielt auf die Wände oder den Boden – wir kommen nicht schnell genug durch die äußere Tür!"
languages.original_text: "To arms! Aim for the walls or the floor — we won't get through the outer door quickly enough!"

traits.locale_text: "Zu den Waffen! Zielt auf die Wände oder den Boden – wir kommen nicht schnell genug durch die äußere Tür!"

languages.text: « Aux armes ! Tirez sur les murs ou sur le sol, la porte prendrait trop de temps ! »
languages.original_text: "To arms! Aim for the walls or the floor — we won't get through the outer door quickly enough!"

traits.locale_text: « Aux armes ! Tirez sur les murs ou sur le sol, la porte prendrait trop de temps ! »

languages.text: "Davranın! Duvarlara, zemine nişan alın. Dış kapıyla uğraşırsak hızlı çıkamayız!"
languages.original_text: "To arms! Aim for the walls or the floor — we won't get through the outer door quickly enough!"

traits.locale_text: "Kuşanın! Duvarlara veya zemine nişan alın. Dış kapıyla uğraşırsak hızlı çıkamayız!"
